Services We Offer

Our expert team specializes in a full suite of Magento development services for your eCommerce store to offer exceptional online shopping experiences

Migration

Headless Development

Future-proof your eCommerce with headless architecture, enhancing flexibility and performance.

Business Development Manager (IT Sales) Middle East

Location: Duabi, UAE

Annual Remuneration: AED 120,000 AED 200,000

Minimum Experience: 5+ years of relevant experience in sales & marketing

Job Summary:

We are seeking an experienced and highly motivated IT Sales Manager/Business Development Manager to join our dynamic team. The successful candidate will be responsible for driving sales growth, expanding our client base, and fostering strategic partnerships within the Middle East region. The role requires a strong understanding of the IT services industry, excellent communication skills, and a proven track record in achieving sales targets.

Roles & Responsibility:

  1. Develop and implement sales strategies to achieve business growth and meet or exceed sales targets.
  2. Identify new business opportunities and potential clients through proactive prospecting, networking, and market research.
  3. 3. Build and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers and influencers in target organizations.
  4. Conduct effective sales presentations and demonstrations to showcase our software development, UI/UX consulting & digital marketing services.
  5. Understand client requirements and provide tailored solutions to meet their specific needs.
  6. Negotiate and close sales contracts while ensuring profitability and customer satisfaction.
  7. Collaborate with the project delivery team to ensure smooth handover and successful execution of projects.
  8. Stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and competitor activities to identify market opportunities.
  9. Represent the company at industry events, conferences, and trade shows to promote our services and generate leads.
  10. Prepare accurate sales forecasts, reports, and market analysis for management review.

Required Skills/Abilities:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field.
  • Must have a UAE driving license.
  • Proven track record in IT sales/business development, preferably in IT & ITes company/IT agency.
  • Strong knowledge of the IT services industry and current market trends.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and negotiate effectively.
  • Demonstrated ability to drive sales growth and achieve targets.
  • Self-motivated and results-oriented, with a proactive approach to identifying and pursuing new business opportunities.
  • Familiarity with CRM software and sales analytics tools.
  • Ability to work independently and collaboratively within a team environment.
  • Willingness to travel as required to meet clients and attend industry events.
  • Fluency in English; knowledge of Arabic is an advantage
  • Proficient with Microsoft Office Suite or related software.

What were able to offer:

  • Competitive salary package with additional incentives Opportunity to be part of a dynamic organization that values innovation, teamwork, and client satisfaction.
  • A growth oriented work from office environment where we learn & grow together
  • 2 Year UAE Residency Visa
  • Medical Insurance
  • One-Way ticket to home country once a year
  • Leave policies as per UAE labour law.

QA Tester (Junior)

Experience Required – 1- 2years

We are looking for a QA Tester to assess Mobile App/Websites/eCommerce Solutions quality through manual testing. You will be responsible for finding and reporting bugs and glitches. In this role, you should have a keen eye for detail and excellent communication skills. If you are also competent in executing test cases and are passionate about quality, wed like to meet you.

Required Skills & Responsibilities

  • Experience in manual testing of applications, websites and software
  • Software development life cycle (SDLC)
  • Can execute all levels of testing including performance, integration, regression and system testing.
  • Can design and develop Test Cases.
  • Should have experience of working in an IT ecosystem
  • Must be a great communicator
  • Should have an eye to detailing
  • Must have a good experience if working as QA Engineer
  • Automated testing experience will be a plus.

Social Media Manager

Experience Required: 2- 2.5yrs

We are looking for a Social media executive who can develop creative, engaging

social media strategies and manage day to day handling of all social media

channels. Should be a team player and be a face for client communication.

Job Responsibility

  • Should have sound experience of working as Social Media Manager ( Social media

marketing + Paid ads & lead generation )

  • Comfortable of working under-pressure and handling multiple projects

simultaneously

  • Can work beyond office hours to meet deadlines
  • Well-versed of using latest SMO tools
  • Must know how to smartly use Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and LinkedIn to grow

visibility of a business

  • Should have experience of managing paid SM campaigns
  • Should have ability to create graphic content on Canva or other tools
  • Should have highly creative thinking and can bring out of the box ideas to optimize

SM pages of clients.

  • Should be comfortable in handling clients online
  • Should have winning attitude
  • Should know how to manage a team of graphic designers, content writers and SM.

 

QA Manual Tester (Senior)

Experience Required – 3- 5years

Required Skills & Responsibilities

We are looking for a QA Tester to assess Mobile App/Websites/eCommerce Solutions quality through manual testing. You will be responsible for finding and reporting bugs and glitches. In this role, you should have a keen eye for detail and excellent communication skills. If you are also competent in executing test cases and are passionate about quality, wed like to meet you.

Requirements

  • Experience in manual testing of applications, websites and software
  • Software development life cycle (SDLC)
  • Can execute all levels of testing including performance, integration, regression and system testing.
  • Can design and develop Test Cases.
  • Should have experience of working in an IT ecosystem
  • Must be a great communicator
  • Should have an eye to detailing
  • Must have a good experience if working as QA Engineer
  • Automated testing experience will be a plus
  • Should have experience of working with overseas clients.

Project Manager/Scrum Master

 

Job description-

We are looking for a Scrum Master/Project Manager to coordinate and coach our software development team. As our project manager/Scrum Master, your job will be to coordinate people and processes to ensure that our projects are delivered on time and produce the desired results. You will be the go-to person for everything involving a projects organization and timeline.

Responsibilities:

  • You will be responsible for recording technical requirements and tracking of the project related features.
  • You will also analyze reported errors, assign them to responsible teams, follow up and monitor the correction progress and actively evaluate technical solutions and interface proposals.
  • Handle allocation of resources to projects and work with the practice to get right resources onboarded to the projects.
  • Develop a complete product requirements document and as well as templates for reference. Coordination, planning, first level tech support, individual issues.
  • Create and maintain rich interactive visualizations through data interpretation and analysis integrating various reporting components from multiple data sources
  • Lead the application scope and objectives and prepare functional & technical specifications.
  • Guide the technical team with DevOps concepts (CI/CD, Branching strategy, configuration management concepts and best practices, migration best practices, etc) and Cloud for delivery.
  • Participate and provide input for execution for Solution Design, process improvement & Engineering Activities
  • Come up delivery Schedule in terms of mile-stone and specific tasks to be completed
  • Understand and effectively lead the execution of the scrum ceremonies and practices with your team.
  • Sprint planning, estimation, backlog grooming, daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, retrospectives, reporting & metrics (e.g., burn down, velocity).
  • Make sure user stories should have acceptance criteria and definition of done clearly defined.
  • Guide team in scope definition, prioritization and backlog creation as well as work breakdown structures, timelines and estimation.
  • Effectively manage Risk, escalations, Dependency and Quality.
  • Provides support and monitors the system. Facilitates small group design sessions or code reviews.
  • Ensure adherence to enterprise and team processes, procedures and guidelines
  • Facilitate the development of user stories and use cases to support the development of functional designs.
  • Tracking progress against plan and resolving any variances as soon as they are identified Work closely with development teams to ensure that all in scope business and technical requirements are incorporated into design and builds, Lead the coordination of release schedules.
  • Timely identifying and Removing impediments to the Development Team’s progress.
  • Making trade-offs between features, schedule, and costs based on their relationship to business goals, company policies, software architecture constraints, and software development team capabilities.

 

Requirements:

  • Engineering or similar degree.
  • Strong organizational leadership skills.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Excellent Analytical skills
  • Able to manage and build large technology and product teams
  • Start-up tech experience will be a plus.
  • Extensive experience in working with stakeholders to create hiring strategies to develop quality teams.
  • Must be knowledgeable about industry trends, best practices, and change management.

Experience Required : Minimum 5yrs

Location: Amritsar/Mohali

Tech Lead

Experience required- 7-10yrs

 

We are searching for an innovative technical lead to join our company. As the technical lead, you will oversee the companys technical team and all projects they undertake, analyze briefs, write progress reports, identify risks, and develop work schedules. You should be able to work with your team and inspire them to reach their goals.

As a MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) Technical Lead, your role and responsibilities will encompass various aspects of software development and team management. Here’s an overview of the key areas you would be involved in:

 

  • You will be responsible for providing technical guidance and leadership to the development team. This involves making architectural decisions, designing solutions, and ensuring adherence to best practices and coding standards.

  • As a technical lead, you’ll collaborate with project managers and stakeholders to define project requirements, scope, and timelines. You’ll be responsible for breaking down the project into tasks, estimating efforts, and creating a development roadmap.

  • You’ll play a crucial role in managing the development team. This involves assigning tasks, setting expectations, and providing mentorship and support to team members. You’ll conduct code reviews, provide feedback, and help resolve technical challenges. It’s important to foster a collaborative and productive work environment, promote knowledge sharing, and ensure effective communication within the team.

  • You’ll stay up-to-date with emerging technologies, frameworks, and tools related to the MERN stack. You’ll evaluate their suitability for projects and make recommendations for adopting new technologies or upgrading existing ones to improve efficiency and maintainability.

 

  • As a technical lead, you’ll be responsible for ensuring the quality of the software being developed. This involves defining and implementing coding standards, conducting regular code reviews, and promoting best practices. You’ll also oversee the testing process, including unit testing, integration testing, and performance testing, to ensure the reliability and stability of the applications.

  • Troubleshooting and Issue Resolution: You’ll assist the team in troubleshooting complex technical issues and providing guidance in problem-solving. You’ll work closely with developers to identify and resolve software defects, performance bottlenecks, and system issues.

 

  • Effective collaboration and communication are crucial for a technical lead. You’ll collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and QA engineers, to ensure alignment and successful project outcomes. Additionally, you’ll provide regular updates to stakeholders, communicate project status, risks, and dependencies.

 

Requirements

  • Min 7 + years of experience working in Technology specifically (MERN Stack)
  • Good problem solving and analytical skills.
  • Knowledge & experience using Git & Jira.
  • Good communication, documentation and presentation skills.
  • 7+ years of hands-on programming experience with an understanding of Object Oriented Programming, Design patterns, Service Oriented Architecture, Concurrency, and SOLID principles.
  • Hands-on .MERN Stack (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS), JavaScript/TypeScript, SSR/NextJS,RESTful APIs, Microservices Architecture,WebSockets/Socket.io, GSAP/PixiJS/Three.js/Canvas
  • Ability to develop software in NodeJS using TypeScript
  • Excellent knowledge of non-relational databases, MongoDB
  • Experience developing enterprise web applications in MERN
  • Experience with test-driven development
  • Proficiency in software engineering tools
  • Proven ability to thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment; self-starter, energetic, independent work ethic.

Web Designer

Experience Required: 1-2yrs

We are looking for a web designer who will be responsible for creating good websites for our clients. Primary duties include conceptualizing and implementing creative ideas for client websites, as well as creating visual elements that are in line with our client’s branding. You will be working closely with our web development team to ensure proper and hassle-free implementation.

To be successful in this role, you will need to have excellent visual design skills.

Web Designer Responsibilities:

  • Conceptualizing creative ideas with clients.
  • Testing and improving the design of the website.
  • Establishing design guidelines, standards, and best practices.
  • Maintaining the appearance of websites by enforcing content standards.
  • Designing visual imagery for websites and ensuring that they are in line with branding for clients.
  • Working with different content management systems.
  • Communicating design ideas using user flows, process flows, site maps, and wireframes.
  • Incorporating functionalities and features into websites.
  • Designing sample pages including colors and fonts.
  • Preparing design plans and presenting the website structure.

Web Designer Requirements:

  • A relevant diploma in a related field.
  • Proficiency in graphic design software including Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Figma and other visual design tools.
  • Proficiency in front-end development web programming languages such as HTML and CSS, JQuery, and JavaScript, React, Angular.
  • Proficiency in working on ecommerce cms like wordpress, Shopify etc.
  • Good understanding of content management systems.
  • Good understanding of search engine optimization principles.
  • Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues.
  • Excellent visual design skills.
  • Up-to-date experience with international web protocols, standards, and technologies.
  • Creative and open to new ideas.
  • Adaptable and willing to learn new techniques.

 

React.js Developer

Experience Required: 3yrs

We are looking for a skilled react.js developer to join our front-end development team who is capable of delivering the project alone. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and implementing user interface components using React.js concepts and workflows such as Redux, Flux, and Webpack. You will also be responsible for profiling and improving front-end performance and documenting our front-end codebase.

React.js Developer Responsibilities:

  • Demonstrating ability and proficiency to develop and implement user interface components using React.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, SCSS, REST etc. at an expert level.
  • Demonstrating development abilities and expertise in existing technologies used by the team (Ex. HTML5, CSS3, React.js and/or back-end support).
  • Translating designs and wireframes into high quality code.
  • Meeting with the development team to discuss user interface ideas and applications.
  • Designing and implementing clean UI and working closely with other developers to create a delightful user experience.
  • Reviewing application requirements and interface designs.
  • Identifying web-based user interactions.
  • Developing and implementing highly responsive user interface components using react concepts.
  • Writing application interface codes using JavaScript following react.js workflows.
  • Troubleshooting interface software and debugging application codes.
  • Developing and implementing front-end architecture to support user interface concepts.
  • Monitoring and improving front-end performance.
  • Documenting application changes and developing updates.

React.js Developer Requirements:

  • Bachelors degree in computer science, information technology, or a similar field.
  • Previous experience working as a react.js developer.
  • In-depth knowledge of JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and front-end languages.
  • Knowledge of REACT tools including React.js, Webpack, Enzyme, Redux, and Flux.
  • Extensive experience in consuming RESTful APIs in application development.
  • Strong knowledge of agile workflows and an ability to collaborate in a fast-paced customer facing application.
  • Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles, CSS, HTML5, JavaScript, and front-end languages.
  • Experience with browser-based debugging and performance testing software.
  • Experience with user interface design.
  • Knowledge of performance testing frameworks including Mocha and Jest.
  • Experience with browser-based debugging and performance testing software.
  • Excellent troubleshooting skills.
  • Good project management skills.
